resources.string: Sorry! Your device doesn\'t support speech input
Smart navigation system for vehicles to avoid collision/road accident.

1.To design and implement a system for detecting nearby vehicles and to plot their position on a map using GPS and ZigBee module. 
2.To calculate the speed of vehicles. 
3.To know in advance about traffic. 
4.To reduce unpredictable accidents.

The number of vehicles are increasing on the road day by day very fastly. This has resulted in increased delay in junctions and an increased rate of accidents. The inability to see vehicles at turns also results in accidents. But the intensity of this condition can be reduced by using latest technologies. We have thought of, and designed a system which would show all the vehicles in a specific range on a map. The system would comprise of several nodes, one node each on a vehicle. A node consists of a mobile application and a ZigBee device. The mobile application would access GPS data and determine the co-ordinates (latitude and longitude). This co-ordinate information would then be transferred to ZigBee device which would broadcast the data. When a node receives broadcast information from any other node, it takes the co-ordinates and plots a marker on the map. In this way, we can see all the vehicles in a specific range. The range depends on the zigbee device and ideally it provides a range of 1 mile(1.6 km).

In this project we are using android device with GPS that will give the current location. It will be read by our android application and transmitted by using bluetooth module to controller and controller will transmit the location by using zigbee module to broadcast our location that is accessed by nearby zigbee module. ZigBee receives the signal and gives the data to the microcontroller,further microcontroller transmit the data through bluetooth to android device .it plots a marker on the map by taking the co-ordinates and by takingand they can see our location. Through this project,we can also calculate the speed of the vehicles.this project will be helpful to predict the vehicles around us resulting we can avoid the unpredictable accident at turning and at the place of inability to see the vehicles.

Android system with GPS 
Bluetooth Module 
ZigBee Module 
Microcontroller 
Resistor 
Capacitor 
Power supply 
Crystal 
Printed circuit board(PCB) 
Soldering wire 
Connecting wires 
Android application

Helps to detect nearby vehicles at turns. 
Helps to know the least busy way at a junction. 
Helps to decide alternate paths to avoid traffic jam. 
Helps to detect emergency vehicles like Ambulance coming behind, and to give way effectively. 
Helps to detect overspeeding vehicles coming on our way to avoid unpredictable accident.

Special protocol can be included to detect the type of vehicle. 
The type of vehicle, like emergency vehicles can be plotted specially on the map. 
The speed of vehicles can also be plotted. 
Overspeeding vehicles can be plotted with warning sign.
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history
